strapiJob.title: Transportation Broker - Agent
strapiJob.description: AGENTS WANTED - We offer a broad range of transportation services including: Dry and Refrigerated - Temp Controlled - LTL - Rail - Flatbeds - Lowboys - Heavy Haul - Oversized Equipment. Whether you need to ship a truckload across the country or a single pallet across the state, we can handle all your freight shipping needs. Join our team of successful agents and leave the regulatory worries to us! We pay carriers less than 30 days! Access to our load posting sites! Earn up to 75% Commission! We are looking for existing agents with a book of business that comes with them and new agent trainees. **Weekly Pay **Customer Protection **Fast Credit Checks **Web Based System **Fast Carrier Set Up **Back Office Support **
